XORP Mailing Lists

The following mailing lists are all hosted at the xorp.org domain.

 xorp-announce XORP software developer discussion  xorp-users  feedback 
List Purpose Options
XORP Release and Milestone announcements list  Join | Archives
 xorp-hackers  Join | Archives
General XORP router discussion   Join | Archives
 xorp-cvs  XORP CVS commit messages and related discussion   Join
Any feedback or problems should be sent to this list
